1474c6ca-8b81-41c4-bdc1-ae8a30cd08a7.name: aim for 10x improvement
1474c6ca-8b81-41c4-bdc1-ae8a30cd08a7.description:
Any activity which does not aim for more than a 10x impovement in the long run will be outcompeted.
Google.

6fef69c6-33ae-47fa-8734-cbcbae7edee4.name: 10x efficiency gain with time invested in planning
6fef69c6-33ae-47fa-8734-cbcbae7edee4.description: 1 unit of time invested in planning usually saves 10 times more in execution

08640bde-8772-4958-b370-cba31695751d.name: the busines is a matter of life and death
08640bde-8772-4958-b370-cba31695751d.description: The business is a matter of life and death, thus it should be conducted according to its seriousness

568d7691-c5da-4a81-9255-416ba6f08df7.description: Everything you do now is dependant and will be interdependant to everything hapenning to you. Thus do your best and leave the rest.
568d7691-c5da-4a81-9255-416ba6f08df7.name: everything is interconnected in life

26520795-2cd3-4210-991f-3d487ed297b6.name: invest in planning
26520795-2cd3-4210-991f-3d487ed297b6.description: Every well invested time in planning results in 2x to 10x improvement in efficiency.

fe752427-5e99-4844-aec7-5c174ddf09b6.name: zero tolerance for bugs
fe752427-5e99-4844-aec7-5c174ddf09b6.description:
A good software does not have bugs. It just works - it might be simple or even dummy looking, but it just works without bugs.
Bugs are like broken window, have several of them and the value of your building will go down straight to zero.

24c9e204-d3b3-430a-b7a3-229b91a310dd.name: compaining is easy, working solutions proposals hard
24c9e204-d3b3-430a-b7a3-229b91a310dd.description: In communication emphasize on WHAT needs to be done and provide reasoning only when asked / it is not obvious for the audience.
